# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We actively support the following versions of Meta-Log Database:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security vulnerabilities seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please follow these steps:

1. **Do NOT** open a public issue
2. Email security details to: [bthornemail@example.com](mailto:bthornemail@example.com)
3. Include:
   - Description of the vulnerability
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Potential impact
   - Suggested fix (if any)

### What to Expect

- We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours
- We will provide an initial assessment within 7 days
- We will keep you informed of our progress
- We will notify you when the vulnerability is fixed

### Disclosure Policy

- We will work with you to understand and resolve the issue
- We will credit you for the discovery (if desired)
- We will publish a security advisory once the issue is resolved
- We will include the fix in the next release

## Security Best Practices

When using Meta-Log Database:

- Keep dependencies up to date: `npm audit` and `npm update`
- Review code before using in production
- Use environment variables for sensitive configuration
- Follow secure coding practices in your application
- Report security issues promptly

Thank you for helping keep Meta-Log Database secure!
